Text: Hey ! Are your comments still of bad taste ? Did you change the way of inquiry ? I will not humor your mindless jibber if you still work on the same way !

The irony of this documentary is that it ignores a blatant fact.  No matter who they think "discovered" America, whoever it was discovered that there were "indians" living there.

I'm not sure how one can discover something that is already inhabited.

sorry docufreak but your initial comment was very rude and very arrogant. If you want perfection in your torrents go buy the originals. The rest of us are happy with the efforts of the few who take the time to encode and upload. 

thanks phatwarez.

"I'm not sure how one can discover something that is already inhabited."

Yes, but someone came here first. It may well have been ancestors of Native Americans, but SOMEONE DID, IN FACT, discover North and South America. Completely illogical to suggest that someone was always already here.
